name: Yatzi - a classic dice poker
description:
Yatzi is a fast and simple dice game to have fun from time to time. But watch out, it is highly addictive too!

Roll 13 rounds and try to get as many points as possible.

Choose between different dice colors to adjust the game to your mood.

Play with strategy or just rely on your luck to compete with the best on the online highscores.
